thread.title: Chelsea FC news: Antonio Conte puts winning over happiness in title pursuit | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea FC news: Antonio Conte puts winning over happiness in title pursuit | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea FC news: Antonio Conte puts winning over happiness in title pursuit | Metro News
text:
Simon Rice for Metro.co.uk Saturday 18 Feb 2017 11:34 am Antonio Conte has turned Chelsea around (Getty) 
Antonio Conte has offered an insight into his ruthless mindset that is bringing such success at Chelsea . 
The Blues find themselves 10 points clear at the top of the Premier League and virtually certain to win the title. Don't hire Howe! A five-point plan for Arsenal to rebuild after Wenger 
The impressive form of the West London club has been achieved with a consistent XI that has meant others have been forced to play a bit-part role. Among the most prominent among them have been captain John Terry and World Cup winning midfielder Cesc Fabregas. John Terry has made just five Premier League appearances and hasn’t started in the league since September (Getty) 
Conte though makes no apologies, stating that winning comes above happiness. 
‘The most important thing, the target, is to win, not to try to have 21 players happy,’ said the former Juventus and Italy manager. 
‘I want to be happy, but I’m happy if we win. Not if we lose and have 21 players happy. 
‘To be happy we go to the theatre, (to) the cinema.
